That's an interesting thought! However, as far as I know, there is no reference in the Doraemon series to suggest that Memory Bread works if someone eats it while they are asleep. The Memory Bread is designed to enhance the memory capacity of a person when they are awake, and it stimulates the brain's learning and recall functions.

It's worth noting that Memory Bread can cause unexpected side effects when consumed in large quantities, such as causing people to remember things that they'd rather forget or making them confused about their current situation. If someone ate Memory Bread while they were asleep, it's possible that they might experience similar side effects when they wake up.

In summary, it's unclear what would happen if someone ate Memory Bread while they were asleep or if they could dream about their old memories. The gadget is primarily designed to work when someone is awake and alert.
